content: the pattern printed on the calendar is wrong i initially submitted the photo and was not informed that the design was accepted they just put in a different pattern there good thing anyone interested can now download the pattern for free here on ravelry i even added a variation for the embellishment details on my blog on this post 1 the last photo shows 3 other hats from the same pattern made by my crochet buddies ashley catena 2 and knitmama247 3 1 http //mycrochetstuff blogspot com/2007/08/baby-hat-pattern-finished html 2 http //www ravelry com/projects/catena 3 http //www ravelry com/projects/knitmama247
